name: Colors's Tricks
description:
Go to story mode: only one gamemode working :D

Commands

Right/Left arrows : Move to Right and Left
SpaceBar : Jump
Up/Down arrows : Swap controled color

What is Color's Tricks

Let me indroduce you Colors's Tricks ! The game when reaching the goal is much more tricky than it looks like !

It's a puzzle platformer game, and on every levels, you will have to guide  some color's characters to their goal position. Once a characters is well placed, it will activate platforms, traps and many things that will make your way harder to place others colors. Inspired by Zelda's donjons paterns, after finishing a level, you will be proud of you, and I will be too !

This game is far from being a finished game but that's a prototype developped during my free-time. Have fun !

Hope you're enjoying it and be sure that I will update many more features with time if you encourage me of! Leave a comment to tell me what you think about it, I will do my best to make this game a great game for everyone !
